ygData.subject: Re: Thank you Brian!  Verant does listen!
ygData.msgSnippet: Granted the Drain spells we will be getting are nothing Norrath-shattering. But still..i can see myself using a 45 Lifedraw WAY more often than i use Voice
ygData.messageBody:
Granted the Drain spells we will be getting are
nothing Norrath-shattering.
But still..i can see myself using a 45 Lifedraw WAY
more often than i use Voice Graft.

Other than giving us another DOT (which they arent
going to do) there wasnt much else they could give us
from the Necro spell book.
this is as good as it is gonna get.

I do not mourn the loss of any of these spells.
I would rather have a worthless Lifedraw spell any day
than something so obviously stupid as Voice Graft.

Its only fun was talking thru NPCs and getting other
players to give the NPC money. Now that we cant do
that..its usefulness is done.


Bathory D'Allatu




--- "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...> wrote:
>
> These spells are very bad mana wise, and can verily
> heal a necro.(we have
> way more hp and far less mana) I thought general
> consensus on the list was
> not for a lifetap change. When Brian asked, I
> thought this was the general
> consensus. I imagine all 25+ SK know these spells
> will not help the class at
> all. Obviously they have not listened to the players
> once again, or perhaps
> I missed a message. The spells will be as useless as
> the ones they took
> away. I doubt even the teen level SK will be helped
> by this, I know the 20+
> will not.
>
>
>
